stickers_header: GET YOUR FREE 'BITCOIN ACCEPTED HERE' STICKERS
stickers_request_details: Let your customers know you accept Bitcoin payments with these free 'Bitcoin Accepted Here' stickers.
stickers_country_global_print: Global â€” Print my own stickers
stickers_request_instructions: You will receive three 'Bitcoin Accepted Here' stickers in a plain white envelope. If you need more than three stickers for your business, feel free to request multiple times. Address data is deleted after your free stickers are shipped.
stickers_print_details: You can print your own 'Bitcoin Accepted Here' stickers, no matter where you live! Click on your language below to view the sticker files & instructions.
stickers_request_language: Don't see your language? Fill out the form below to request 'Bitcoin Accepted Here' sticker files in your local language.
